ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: RLM (140710/2013-2; 152303/2016-2; 151473/2018-8) and FMLT thank CNPq for providing scholarship. LTFS, RLA and RRR thank CAPES for providing scholarship. Work by DB was supported by CNPQ/PDS post-doctoral fellowship and work by PL was supported by FAPESP post-doctoral fellowship (FAPESP 2014/22344-6). RPB, LCT, TFR and JAFDF are grateful to CNPq by fellowships Research Productivity. Work by LCT, TFR, RPB and JAFDF on niche modeling have been developed in the context of National Institutes for Science and Technology (INCT) in Ecology, Evolution and Biodiversity Conservation, supported by MCTIC/CNPq (proc. 465610/2014-5) and FAPEG (proc. 201810267000023).
